text: Mihály Nagymarosi (6 October 1919 in Nagymaros - 7 September 2002 in Nagymaros) was a Hungarian football midfielder, who played for Újpest FC, as well as representing 13 times the Hungarian national football team between 1942 and 1950. He was a member of the Hungarian Golden Team. ==External links== * Player profile at sportmuzeum.hu Category:1919 births Category:2002 deaths Category:Hungarian footballers Category:Hungary international footballers Category:Újpest FC players Category:People from Nagymaros Category:Association football midfielders
title: Mihály Nagymarosi
